email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Linda,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you provide a prompt vessel offer along with the initial freight rate?

Best regards,
James Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the MV OCEAN HORIZON, which is currently open in Santos and can be positioned to Tubarao for a laycan of October 5-10. The initial freight rate is $28.50 per metric tonne, CIF Rotterdam. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290 meters.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Linda Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

Thank you for the prompt response. The laycan works for us, but the rate of $28.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the expected loading window in Tubarao?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

After reviewing the market, we can offer a revised rate of $27.75 per metric tonne, CIF Rotterdam. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day pro rata, and the loading window in Tubarao is expected to be 72 hours.

Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

The revised rate of $27.75 is acceptable. Please confirm the details and proceed with the fixture. We will need the charter party agreement sent over for review.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam - Fixture Confirmed
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your confirmation. The fixture is now confirmed for the MV OCEAN HORIZON with a laycan of October 5-10, freight rate of $27.75 per metric tonne, CIF Rotterdam. The charter party agreement will be sent to you within the next hour for review.

Best regards,
Linda
